description: This file is a shell script named 'dca_utility.sh' that provides utility functions and logic related to telemetry data collection, configuration management, remote communication, and process coordination within a network device environment, likely for RDK-B platform. It includes functions for system info collection, configuration generation, scheduled tasks, and external process interactions.

methods.name: dcaCleanup
methods.description: Cleans up telemetry-related files and prepares for next telemetry cycle or system reboot.

methods.name: clearTelemetryConfig
methods.description: Removes telemetry configuration files and resets telemetry directory structure.

methods.name: generateTelemetryConfig
methods.description: Parses a JSON input file to generate telemetry configuration files used for telemetry data collection.

methods.name: scheduleCron
methods.description: Reads telemetry scheduling configuration and updates the system's cron jobs accordingly.

methods.name: dropbearRecovery
methods.description: Restarts the dropbear SSH service if not running, ensuring SSH access for remote management.
